title: Red Receives Her Mother’s Urgent Request
summary: Red’s mother instructs her to deliver medicine and food to her ailing grandmother deep in the woods, warning her to stay on the path and avoid strangers. Red hesitates but accepts, motivated by concern for her grandmother’s worsening condition. She packs a basket and sets out at dawn, crossing into the dark, misty forest.

title: The Wolf Stalks and Interrogates Red
summary: While traversing the forest, Red is approached by a cunning, strangely articulate wolf who questions her about her destination. Red, unsettled by the wolf’s persistence, lies about her route, but the wolf notices her basket and deduces her real intentions. The wolf decides to take a shortcut to grandmother’s house, leaving Red behind with a false sense of safety.

title: Red Faces Terrors in the Woods
summary: As Red continues, she finds strange claw marks and the remains of a deer, realizing she may be followed. She debates whether to turn back but presses on after recalling her mother’s plea. Suddenly, she is startled by an unseen presence and runs, dropping her basket, but manages to recover it and escapes deeper into the woods.

title: The Wolf Breaks Into Grandmother’s Cabin
summary: The wolf arrives at the grandmother’s cabin and tricks her into opening the door by imitating Red’s voice. He violently subdues and locks her in a closet, then disguises himself in her clothes. The wolf studies grandmother’s possessions, preparing to ambush Red and satisfy his hunger.

title: Red Arrives and Senses Something Wrong
summary: Red reaches the cabin and immediately notices the door ajar and signs of a struggle. She calls out for her grandmother and hesitantly steps inside, keeping her mother’s warnings in mind. Hearing muffled sounds, Red grabs a fireplace poker for protection and creeps toward the bedroom.

title: Red Confronts the Impostor
summary: Red enters the bedroom and sees the disguised wolf in bed. She questions 'grandmother' about her strange appearance, growing more suspicious. When the wolf lunges, Red uses the poker to fend him off, wounding the creature and forcing it to reveal its true form.

title: Fight for Survival and Rescue
summary: Red flees the bedroom as the wounded wolf pursues her through the cabin. She discovers the closet and frees her terrified grandmother. Together, they barricade themselves in the kitchen, using furniture to block the wolf’s entry. As the wolf breaks in, Red sets a fire trap, ultimately killing the beast and escaping with her grandmother into the dawn-lit woods.
